Title: Motherland, I love you
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: According to a post on sohu.com, the three women are overseas Chinese, "returned from overseas to enjoy the beautiful scenery of the motherland. When climbing the towering and majestic Great Wall, facing the great rivers and mountains of the motherland, they couldn't help but cry out 'Motherland, I love you'." The camera probably is a Seagull - 海鸥 - produced in China.Sourceshttps://www.sohu.com/a/652632277_121608744 (retrieved 20 July 2023)
